name: Hearts - Solitaire Line
description:
You can move or drag cards with a single tap to their destination. The cards should be ranked from K to A (from large to small), only K can be placed into the blank space and only A can be placed into the upper designated spot.

Features:
1.Draw 1 card (Easy）or 3 cards（Hard） as you like
2.Unlimited UNDOS and HINTS supported
3.Auto-collect cards on completion
4.Play any time & any where
5. Vegas scoring
What are you waiting for? Download Hearts Solitaire Line FREE today and enjoy it!
